Class Food_Drink

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.Food_Drink

  • public class Food_Drink
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the handles the different objects of the game.
    Author:
    Dani

      • CalcNewPos

        public void CalcNewPos(int elapsedTime)

        Parameters:

      • RandomType

        public Food_Drink.Food_Drinks_Type RandomType()
        This function generates the new type of an object. We use a gaussian pszeudo random number to determine the type of the object. The low value objects are closer to the mean value and the higher value objects are far from the mean value.
